__TOC__

=== Boot Parameter ===

'''iso-scan/filename='''

==== example ====

To boot a livecd iso with grub2
for example if you placed the ubuntu-xxx.iso under the usb drive /boot/ubuntu-xxx.iso
<pre>
menuentry LiveISO {
loopback iso (hd0,1)/boot/ubuntu-xxx.iso
linux (iso)/casper/vmlinuz boot=casper iso-scan/filename=/boot/ubuntu-xxx.iso --
initrd (iso)/casper/initrd.gz
}
</pre>
